attributes.action: assist in the provision of one (1) potato to every school age child in the land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Obviously this is drivel intended for the reject pile, but then so are many of the genuine petitions. 

I appreciate that this is a new initiative and improvements are planned, but the whole thing feels a bit pointless and probably in need of stricter editing. Is anything actually going to come out of these petitions?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
